input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel Real Pre-Lit Scotch Creek Fir Garland'
  - Name='Charlton Home Holiday Christmas 4-Piece Set'
  - Name='One Allium Way 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland with Lights'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 4-Piece Set Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland Wreath Christmas Trees'
  - Name='Lightshare 41'' LED Lighted Trees & Branches'
  - Name='Etta Avenue Sparkle White Spruce Lighted Faux Spruce Garland'
  - Name='Haute Decor 6 Foot Christmas Pre-Lit Mantel Swag'
  - Name='Artificial Christmas Tree set with Wreath & Garland and LED Light Alcott Hill'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9-ft. Foxtail Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 10" Mixed 2-Tone Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Real Touch Norfolk Pine Garland'
  - Name='Christmas Set of 4, Garland Wreath and 2 Entrance Tree Sets with Warm White LED Lights Charlton Home'
  - Name='Northlight Flocked Pine and Ornaments Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6 ft. Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company First Traditions Collection 9Ft Pre-Lit Artificial North Conway Garland'
  - Name='Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit Greenery Pine Cone Christmas Garland with Warm LED Lights (2-Pack'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6 ft. Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9' Artificial Glittery Mountain Spruce Garland with Clear Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel Real Pre-Lit Scotch Creek Fir Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product by the same brand, pre-lit artificial fir garland with realistic branch tips, likely similar construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charlton Home Holiday Christmas 4-Piece Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A set including multiple holiday items; garland may be included but not isolated as a pre-lit Carolina Pine garland, less focused and somewhat related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: One Allium Way 9ft Pre-Lit Christmas Garland with Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit 9ft Christmas garland similar in length and lighting features; lacks specific branch type but very relevant in function and placement.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 4-Piece Set Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland Wreath Christmas Trees
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Contains pre-lit garland but bundled with wreath and trees; garland feature less emphasized and product is a set, slightly less direct relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lightshare 41'' LED Lighted Trees & Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted branches and trees but likely partial branches, smaller size, not a full garland, different product form and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Etta Avenue Sparkle White Spruce Lighted Faux Spruce Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted faux spruce garland similar function and construction, different branch type (spruce vs. pine) and perhaps sparkle effect.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Haute Decor 6 Foot Christmas Pre-Lit Mantel Swag
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit mantel swag similar decoration piece but shorter length and swag style differs from standard garland form.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Artificial Christmas Tree set with Wreath & Garland and LED Light Alcott Hill
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Set including garland but primarily a multi-product bundle, garland less specified and secondary.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9-ft. Foxtail Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An artificial Christmas tree of similar branch type and size but not a garland; different product category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 10" Mixed 2-Tone Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same pine garland, similar size and construction, no explicit mention of lights but very close in form and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Real Touch Norfolk Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar product type (pine garland) with realistic touch; lighting not specified but highly relevant in core type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Set of 4, Garland Wreath and 2 Entrance Tree Sets with Warm White LED Lights Charlton Home
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Multi-item holiday set including garland; garland details unclear, lower relevance as standalone product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Flocked Pine and Ornaments Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pine garland with additional flocking and ornaments; decor elements differ but core product type aligns.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pine garland, shorter length and no mention of lights; otherwise relevant in construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pine garland, shorter length and no mention of lights; otherwise relevant in construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company First Traditions Collection 9Ft Pre-Lit Artificial North Conway Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit garland of similar size, artificial branches; very close in purpose and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 9' Pre-Lit Greenery Pine Cone Christmas Garland with Warm LED Lights (2-Pack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland similar in length and features, including pine cones, very relevant though different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Repeated product name from before; same rationale appliesâ€”a shorter, non-lit pine garland by same brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Repeated product name from before; same rationale appliesâ€”a shorter, non-lit pine garland by same brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9' Artificial Glittery Mountain Spruce Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar length and lighting by same brand, but spruce rather than pine and glittery finish makes it somewhat less similar.
